author: Cr√∏wned Kit
comment: Here's a few reasons why this fits and I love it. When Emma and Norman left Little Bunny (the bunny stuffed animal) at the place with the car or whatever its called and Isabella (the mom) found it, she knew *someone* found out about what they were doing, she immediately suspected Emma, Norman, or Ray, and the line in the song, 'what do you know', is so perfectly placed, because that was when Isabella was asking Emma is she was ok, and she wasn't her cheery self. And when it played 'honestly I thought that I'd be dead right now', young Isabella was being asked to become the next person to inherit the role as a mom, and there was a huge demon (I think their called). Then during around the beginning of the video, where Emma and Norman were chatting and walking down stairs and it played 'what are you wondering', Isabella was watching them. Anyway this was really cool, epic job :D

author: Eno P
comment: People keep saying Isabella is a good. I don‚Äôt agree with that. Isabella is neither good nor bad. She‚Äôs a victim of an evil system, and she did what she had to do to survive. She‚Äôs a survivor, that‚Äôs all. Unlike Emma, who much rather die than become part of that system, Isabella thought first and foremost of herself and that‚Äôs why she lost her humanity along the way. She hasn‚Äôt lost it completely because she felt glad the children escaped. However, she‚Äôs not good either. When the children escaped,they showed her another option and what you can accomplish if you‚Äôre willing to sacrifice even your life to help others. Even as a child, Isabella tried to escape, it seems, but she was trying to do it by herself, again, showing the difference between her and Emma.I haven‚Äôt read the manga, so I don‚Äôt know if we will see more of her or not. I hope we do and see how this has affected her. I like this series because characters are not so black or white. You could literally talk on and on about these characters.üòÖ

author: Siyeon „ÉÑ
comment: bc she went through 10+ years of mental torture, an unwanted pregnancy, and forced competition with her peers in risk of becoming demon food...? she went through exactly what the children did and saw no hope outside of GF. To her, it was life or death. She broke Emma's leg because she thought all that waited for them outside the farms was a painful death. She wanted Ray's brain because she thought if any of the fullscores died, she would too, essentially making the remainder of her life useless‚Äîalso, they were literally a DAY away from Ray's birthday, aka what Isabella had known for the past 12 years to be when he was going to be killed. Isabella had already accepted the fact that Ray was going to die, like she accepted the death of any of the other children (as creepy as that is, I can't find to hate her). Her threats to kill the children were obviously empty. She can't kill them. She'd be killed instead. It was her way of trying to scare the children into staying at GF.

author: Anima
comment: This was the best AMV I have ever seen. The song choice was perfect.    Starting from the beginning, aligning the clock with the sound really caught my attention an immediately made me drawn to this amv. There isn't too much movement so we get disorientated (I hate when people over-do it!) and the grey filter over it made the atmostphere fit and also allowed us to focus more on the emotions. You even timed the lyrics--I can't say no -- Isabella unable to say no because she'll die. It's the only path she can take. The fact that you timed the sounds from the anime and the song was just icing on the cake...it was incredible!! I have to say this is incredible, and I absolutely adore it!!

comment: I honestly think Isabelle was so hard on the kids when they tried to escape because if they survived and got away from her, they had a chance at surviving beyond the wall. That's why she smiled. She never wanted to pass on this curse, but she had no choice. So when they made it out, she thought, Finally, a chance. If she had just let them leave she would of been gotten rid of and the kids would of likely been to proud of themselves not to think of the threats and how worse the demons/monsters are. Now that they know how hard it was to escape from just a human, they will not undermined the demons/monsters.

author: Adam DR
comment: For being your first AMV this is seriously good. I really like AMVs but most are poorly edited and just slap action scenes and music like that meant to fit, but this one is really good. The first 7 seconds is a great hook and makes me want to watch more.    A few things I would suggest  1- I don't think cutting out the song completely from the video then putting normal speech in fits very well, like at 0:57. 2- I really like when the feeling of the song and feel of the clips match it creates an awesome music video that seems like it the original, it's even better when it tells a story or points out a theme in the anime that might not be so apparent.   3- Since it is your first AMV I would watch som other AMV  channels and get some ideas, personally I think oMuStIiA's channel creates some really great AMVs. I Recommend watching  Dollhouse from their channel for some ideas.    Overall a great Stand alone AMV and even a better first start, you earned yourself a sub and I look forward to seeing more of your content in the future.

author: BadLuck Nat
comment: Thanks for the tips! I watch A LOT of AMVs :DD , also i like when there are original sounds form the anime completing the song, and i dont think the spoken part would work during the singing. But thats just personal preference i guess) Thanks again tho)  Seeing the positive reactions I will definitely make more AMVs, right now I just have a lot of school work cuz im getting my diploma in spring

author: The Spell Alchemist
comment: I loved.   I loved my home.   I loved Leslie.  I loved‚Ä¶.  I could stay strong‚Ä¶because I had that tune with me. I have no regrets. After all, this was the path I chose for myself. I can't change the world. What would my death do ? If anything, I need to make the best of what I do have. I must provide all of the love inside of me. I must let them live as long as possible. These children know nothing. He's no longer around.   I must live for myself‚Ä¶to give purpose to Leslie's life.   I wanted to live longer than anybody else. I was unbelievably frustrated‚Ä¶to find out he had been killed. I can't do or change a single thing. And that's exactly why‚Ä¶ I wanted to do the least I could do‚Ä¶to live‚Ä¶as a human they COULDN'T EAT!   I suppose it‚Ä¶doesn't matter anymore.  This is my defeat  Those children have escaped.  I am now a useless keeper who couldn't protect her own goods. Just now, all of my efforts to reach the top have been utterly destroyed. No matter how hard I try to capture those children again, I‚Ä¶  Perhaps if I had kept Krone around‚Ä¶ If I hadn't let Norman see the other side of the wall that day‚Ä¶ The results may have been different.
